comment.author: 14578355@N02
comment._content: Fantastic images! I wonder who took these photographs?

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Another three-man "human chain" ... I wonder if these are the same guys ... "A Steep Climb, Kosciusko Drift" by Kerry & Co.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic accompanied an article on Wragge's observatory at Mt Kosciuszko which photographer Charles Kerry wrote for the Sydney Mail in December 1897...the pics appeared on p. 1363 (I can't work out how to link to the pics!) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=FvlPAAAAIBAJ&sjid=JZUDA... Other pics of this expedition taken by Kerry also appeared in the Australian Town & Country Journal in December 1897 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/71281410 Also see [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3369189167/]
